tools.name: One Pager
tools.description: Create concise and effective game design documents. Capture essential aspects of your game including identity, one-liner, core concept, gameplay actions, and what makes your game unique.

tools.name: TinySVG
tools.description: Optimize and simplify your SVG files with precision. Remove metadata, inline styles, collapse groups, and more to make your SVGs smaller and cleaner.

tools.name: Steam Review Analyzer
tools.description: Get AI-powered insights from Steam game reviews. Analyze reviews by type (Most Helpful, Last Update, Positive Only, Negative Only) and gain valuable insights about any Steam game.

tools.name: Icon Repo
tools.description: Search, find and edit web's free open-licensed Icons. Explore our vast icon library with 250K+ icons, edit them however you like and download them for free to use for commercial purposes.

tools.name: SVG Repo
tools.description: Free SVG vectors and icons. Search, explore and edit the best-fitting free icons or vectors for your projects using this collection of 500,000+ Open-licensed SVG vectors and icons.

tools.name: Site Manifest Generator
tools.description: Create compliant PWA manifests in seconds with smart color extraction, icon generation, and website analysis for progressive web applications.

tools.name: MeltingFace
tools.description: AI-powered concept visualizer and creative tool that helps you discover colors, emojis, and fonts to get unstuck in your creative process.

tools.name: SVG API
tools.description: Rest API to search and list wide variety of icons. Build awesome stuff with free and maker-friendly pricing points.

tools.name: Open Design License
tools.description: Open Design is accessible to anyone who is able to get, use, change, and share it, as long as it is kept track of, not redistributed in the same way

tools.name: SVG Find
tools.description: Explore our vast vector library and find the perfect icons or vectors for your projects. Edit them to your desire and download them.

tools.name: Vector Mixer
tools.description: A vector mixing application that has tools to customize attributes such as size, color, background, and other characteristics of a vectors

tools.name: Text2Icon
tools.description: text2icon is an AI web app that generates icons based on given text in black and white color palette, and allows you to download SVG.

tools.name: Carbon Neutral Website
tools.description: A carbon emission calculator that takes into account the power consumption of device and server during browsing a web page.

tools.name: VectorMaker
tools.description: Convert images to SVG vectors, PNG-to-SVG Vectors. Vectormaker outlines your pixel based images and turns them into colored SVG vector files.
